Rafforty: Then, allow me to continue. We have not found a way to save our guild members or Kier. For now they seem doomed to remain ice sculptures. But the information they died for is very valuable. They discovered *how to defeat Ice Queen Freya*! And for that, their deaths were not in vain! [Quest _10283_RequestOfIceMerchant 32020-05.htm|Continue listening.]
